T02D2107:136a-0: @136a ` // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zab cing rgya che ba'i 'grel ba bzhugs//
T02D2107:136a-2: # // 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2107:136a-3: rten ldan de nyid sgrub 'dod pas //
T02D2107:136a-4: bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags tshul lam //
T02D2107:136a-5: ye shes lnga khyab la btud nas //
T02D2107:136a-6: zab cing rgya chen gsal bar dbye //
T02D2107:136a-7: chos kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag dang po 'dis brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D2107:136a-9: brjod bya'i dgos pa la sogs pa la sogs pa brjod pa yin no ;
T02D2107:136a-10: / byang chub sems bskyed ces bya ba nas /
T02D2107:136a-11: tshul 'di yin zhes bya bas thabs brjod pa yin no //
T02D2107:136a-12: ji ltar mkha' la zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2107:136a-13: chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes bya bas lam dman pa dgag pas khyad par brjod pa yin no //
T02D2107:136a-14: thugs kyi gsang mdzod ces bya ba nas nye bar
T02D2107:136a-15: bsdus bshad ces bya bas brjod bya dang rjod pa'i
T02D2107:136a-16: khyab pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D2107:136a-17: de lta'i lam ni zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2107:136a-18: byas pa yin zhes bya bas gzhung nye bar bsdus pa yin no //
T02D2107:136a-19: don gyi brjod bya 'jam dpal gyi ngo bo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2107:136a-20: chos kun rang bzhin 'jam dpal ye shes sems //
T02D2107:136a-22: chos ni phung po lnga la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D2107:136a-23: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa rnams so //
T02D2107:136a-24: de dag gis shes bya bsdus par 'gyur ba'am /
T02D2107:136a-25: yang na de dag la nyon mongs pa lnga dang
T02D2107:136a-26: spyi bsdus pa dang ldan pa'i chos kun ni rgyud
T02D2107:136a-27: 'dir 'dod do // de'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo
T02D2107:136a-28: nyid de stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
T02D2107:136a-29: 'dir 'dod do // dang / smon pa med pa dang /
T02D2107:136a-30: 'dus ma byas pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2107:136a-31: 'dis ni 'gro ba dbyings nyid du khyab pa blangs pa yin no //
T02D2107:136a-32: nges pa'i yul la byed pa po med pa dang
T02D2107:136a-33: rgyu nyid yin pas na 'di ni ngo bo nyid
T02D2107:136b-0: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / dngos po kun gyi rang @136b bzhin 'dzin //
T02D2107:136b-1: skye med chos de sna tshogs don //
T02D2107:136b-2: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
T02D2107:136b-3: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
T02D2107:136b-4: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
T02D2107:136b-5: zhes gsungs pas grub pa yin no //
T02D2107:136b-6: de tsam yin yang nges pa'i yul la byed pa
T02D2107:136b-7: po med na 'gro ba dang sangs rgyas khyad par
T02D2107:136b-8: med pa de'i mngon du byed pa'i lam bstan pa
T02D2107:136b-9: ni / sems zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad pa ste /
T02D2107:136b-10: sems kyi gnas skabs 'dir ni lam shes la rgyun gyis 'jug pa mi mthun pa dang /
T02D2107:136b-11: gnyen po gnyis su shes nas nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i lam 'chad pa rnams so //
T02D2107:136b-12: 'di'i don yang nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa//
T02D2107:136b-13: shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag / ces gsungs pas bshad pa yin no //
T02D2107:136b-14: 'di ni ngo bo nyid blo bur ba dang ldan pa dag la lam gyis 'byin par dgongs pa'o //
T02D2107:136b-15: yang spong ba dang sgrub pa rgyun 'chad par gyur pa ni /
T02D2107:136b-16: 'jam dpal ye shes la bya ste /
T02D2107:136b-17: 'bras bu nyid du bdag dgongs pa'i rgyud 'dir zug rdu lnga la sogs pa dang /
T02D2107:136b-18: 'ching ba las grol zhing dbyings bzhi lus la ye
T02D2107:136b-19: shes rnams ro mnyam du 'dres pa de la 'jam
T02D2107:136b-20: pa zhes bya'o // 'di nyid bdag dang gzhan gyi
T02D2107:136b-21: don phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa'i gzhir gyur
T02D2107:136b-23: sems zhes bya ba ni rgyun dang nyid dang rang bzhin yin pas gsum par yang sbyar ro //
T02D2107:136b-24: de yang so so rang rig mi g-yo ba //
T02D2107:136b-25: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
T02D2107:136b-26: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2107:136b-27: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad la //
T02D2107:136b-28: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D2107:136b-29: de ltar ston pas brjod bya dmigs pa'i yul du thugs la bzhag nas /
T02D2107:136b-30: de yi brjod pa bstan pa ni //
T02D2107:136b-31: bde gshegs ma lus kun gyi mtshan gyur pa //
T02D2107:136b-32: zhes bya ba smos te de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang /
T02D2107:136b-33: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa las byon zhing ston pa'o //
T02D2107:136b-34: ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2107:136b-35: 'gro ba kun rdzob can gyi ngo bor byung ba dang /
T02D2107:136b-36: kun rdzob gyi char gshegs shing ston pa ste /
T02D2107:136b-37: dus dang phyogs ma lus pa'i ma lus pa la
T02D2107:136b-38: kun du zhes bstan pa ni kha cig zad par
T02D2107:136b-39: gyi ming dang don la zer ro //
T02D2107:136b-40: 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan rnams gsungs pa yin pas de 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2107:137a-0: gang gi phyir ma dag pa mtshan du gyur @137a * //
T02D2107:137a-4: de las byung ba'i phyir rgyu la gus pa'o //
T02D2107:137a-5: mtshan gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2107:137a-6: mtshan dag sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa la lhag par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2107:137a-7: de yang bcu phrag brgyad dang drug nyid dang /
T02D2107:137a-8: brgya phrag gcig dang brgyad cu gcig /
T02D2107:137a-9: bcu phrag bdun la gcig lhag pa //
T02D2107:137a-10: brgya phrag gnyis dang bdun cu lnga //
T02D2107:137a-11: brgya phrag gcig dang de la lnga //
T02D2107:137a-12: brgya phrag gcig la lnga med pa'o //
T02D2107:137a-13: lnga phrag bcu la gsum lhag dang //
T02D2107:137a-14: de bzhin du ni snga ma'i grangs //
T02D2107:137a-15: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad kyis bstan pa'o //
T02D2107:137a-16: brjod pa de dag gang gis ji ltar brjod pa ni ;
T02D2107:137a-17: rdo rje 'chang chen rnams kyi glur blangs don //
T02D2107:137a-19: stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'chang pa ste /
T02D2107:137a-20: bde ba chen po blo mnyam pa'i sku'o //
T02D2107:137a-21: de yang mi nyams shing kun la khyab pas de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2107:137a-23: khyab pa po'i sku nyid kun rdzob kyi ngor dus med dus kyi rnam par snang ba ste /
T02D2107:137a-24: dngos po'i cha 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:137a-25: de dag gis sku nyams su bstar ba'i chos thams
T02D2107:137a-26: cad rang bzhin gyis rnam bar dag pa de gsal
T02D2107:137a-27: bar gdul bya la dbye ba ni glur blangs pa'o
T02D2107:137a-29: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D2107:137a-30: ma byon rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la //
T02D2107:137a-31: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2107:137a-32: yang dang yang du gsung ba gang //
T02D2107:137a-33: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02D2107:137a-35: dpag med rnams kyis dga' bzhin du //
T02D2107:137a-36: glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol //
T02D2107:137a-38: don dam par dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o //
T02D2107:137a-39: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //
T02D2107:137a-41: de ltar brjod pa bstan pa de'i dgos pa ni //
T02D2107:137a-42: de bzhin bya bas bstan pa yin no //
T02D2107:137a-43: don ni gang gis ji ltar brjod pa'i don khong
T02D2107:137a-44: du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu
T02D2107:137a-47: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
T02D2107:137a-48: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
T02D2107:137a-49: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
T02D2107:137a-50: mi skye'i chos can 'di gsungs pa //
T02D2107:137a-52: tshig gi bdag po ni brjod bya'i dgos pa mthong ba'o //
T02D2107:137b-1: rjod byed mtshan don mthong ba'o //
T02D2107:137b-2: gsang sngags rgyal po ni brjod bya'i dgos pa lam gyi khyad par ro //
T02D2107:137b-3: drug ldan ni lam de'i dmigs pa dang /
T02D2107:137b-4: mi mthun pa drug tu gzigs pa ste /
T02D2107:137b-5: de yang gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang /
T02D2107:137b-6: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
T02D2107:137b-7: zhes pa'i bar gyis bsdus so //
T02D2107:137b-8: 'di dag gi 'brel pa gang gis rtogs pa ni //
T02D2107:137b-9: skye bo blo bzang nyon zhes bya bar 'brel ba'o //
T02D2107:137b-10: blo bzang ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa rang dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D2107:137b-11: skye bo zhes smos pas sgrub pa po mtshan zab pa dang /
T02D2107:137b-12: rgya che bar gtogs par 'dra'i dbyibs dang cha byad
T02D2107:137b-13: kyang bum pa la sogs pas ni ma yin no
T02D2107:137b-14: // nyon zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dang ldan
T02D2107:137b-15: pas dgos 'brel shes nas nyams su blang bya la
T02D2107:137b-17: zab cing rgya chen zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2107:137b-18: brjod bya'i dgos pa ston te /
T02D2107:137b-19: zab pa'i bdag gis bsdus pa'i sku'o //
T02D2107:137b-20: rgya che ba ni gzhan gyis bsdus pa'i sku'o //
T02D2107:137b-22: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2107:137b-23: sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
T02D2107:137b-24: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02D2107:137b-26: de ltar dgos pa la sogs pas zhugs pa rnams
T02D2107:137b-27: ji ltar 'bras bu de ltar bsgrub par bya snyam
T02D2107:137b-28: pa la thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2107:137b-29: byang chub sems bskyed lhag pas lhar dmigs la //
T02D2107:137b-31: byang chub nam mkha' lta bu dang sems can la phan pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2107:137b-32: de nas de'i ched du spyod pa dri ma med pa sgrub par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2107:137b-33: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems yin no //
T02D2107:137b-34: de yang snying rje rtsa ba las pa yi //
T02D2107:137b-35: thabs kyi mthar ni son pa'o //
T02D2107:137b-37: de yang rgya che ba dang snying rjes rgyun chags bya ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
T02D2107:137b-38: chos thams cad don dam par lhag par mos pa ni ye shes so //
T02D2107:137b-40: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni mtha' yas te /
T02D2107:137b-41: mdor bsdu na bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
T02D2107:137b-42: ye shes kyi tshogs zhes pa dang /
T02D2107:137b-44: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
T02D2107:137b-46: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o //
T02D2107:138a-3: 'khor gsum dmigs pa med pa byang chub dang sems can la dmigs pa ni sems bskyed de /
T02D2107:138a-4: srid pa dang zhi ba las rnal 'byor bsrung ba'o //
T02D2107:138a-5: des bdag gi srung ba yang 'gyur te /
T02D2107:138a-6: lhag pas lhar dmigs la zhes pa la bdag gi
T02D2107:138a-7: sems ji ltar sbyangs pa'i dag pa ni lhag pa'i
T02D2107:138a-8: don dang phrad par byed pas lhag pa'o //
T02D2107:138a-9: de nyid las kha dog dang dbyibs kyi dam tshig
T02D2107:138a-10: tu lta ba ni don gyis lus las byung bas
T02D2107:138a-11: lta zhes bya'o // dmigs pa ni de dag gnyis med par sbyor ba'o //
T02D2107:138a-12: 'dis rnal 'byor pa khyad par can dang //
T02D2107:138a-13: rgyud khyad par can gyis mchog gi rnal 'byor pa bla ma'i kha las brgyud par dgongs so //
T02D2107:138a-14: srung ba gnyis sngon du song bas ji ltar bsgrub snyam pa la /
T02D2107:138a-15: rten 'brel rnam gsum sgyu ma'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2107:138a-16: ma lus gnyis med mkha' khyab sprul tshogs dgu //
T02D2107:138a-17: zhes bya ba la rten 'brel ni rang bzhin gyis ma bcos pa ste ;
T02D2107:138a-18: gang gi phyir mtha' gnyis rten 'brel la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:138a-19: de la brten pa 'dus shing glo bur du rten
T02D2107:138a-20: cing 'byung ba ni ming tsam dang gdod ma nas
T02D2107:138a-22: rang bzhin de'i byed pa ni sbyor ba ste /
T02D2107:138a-23: 'dus pa la brten pa dang 'brel pa dang zhes
T02D2107:138a-24: bya ba ni ma skyes par gtogs pa'i rnam grangs
T02D2107:138a-25: so // 'di nyid bya ba gsum gyis byed de /
T02D2107:138a-26: dag pa'i byin gyis brlab pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob bo //
T02D2107:138a-27: 'di yang mi bden lta bur snang bas ngo bo ma yin bas sgyu ma'o //
T02D2107:138a-28: de yang rang bzhin med pa'i snang ba la sgyu ma zhes brtags so //
T02D2107:138a-29: gnyis par gyur pa sgyu ma dang rten 'brel ni
T02D2107:138a-30: skyes bu rnams dbyer med pa la sgyu mar ma
T02D2107:138a-31: rtogs pa dag la 'dod pa bsgrubs pa'o //
T02D2107:138a-32: yid ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi byad pa por dgongs pa'o //
T02D2107:138a-33: don dam par ma skyes pas kun rdzob kyang ni
T02D2107:138a-34: rigs pa'i yul du gyur pa la rigs pa'i yul
T02D2107:138a-35: ma yin pas sgyu ma nyams pa'o //
T02D2107:138a-36: sgyu ma yang sgyu ma nyid la snang gi gzhan
T02D2107:138a-37: du skye ba dang 'gag pa la sel ba dang
T02D2107:138a-39: gang yang rnam par rig pa tsam la sogs pa
T02D2107:138a-40: rten 'brel don du khas blangs pa la ni rnam
T02D2107:138a-41: par bcad pa 'dod pa yin gyi /
T02D2107:138a-42: phyogs gzhan gyi ngor mi snang ba dang yod par yang ma yin no //
T02D2107:138b-0: @138b rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul la snang ba'i tha
T02D2107:138b-1: snyad 'gag pa dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin te
T02D2107:138b-2: / rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:138b-3: de nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2107:138b-4: ma lus pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i khyab pa'i chos rnams so //
T02D2107:138b-5: gnyis med pa ni de dag la gnyis med pa dang de dag gnyis mad de ;
T02D2107:138b-6: / kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i 'jug pa gnyis ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:138b-7: gang gi phyir mi bden par rtog pas 'jug pa dang /
T02D2107:138b-8: bden pa la mi rtog pas 'jug pa gnyis yin no zhe na /
T02D2107:138b-9: de bzhin nyid ma gtogs pa rnams la ni skyes
T02D2107:138b-10: bus 'dod pas kyang bzhag de yang de nyid mthong
T02D2107:138b-12: pha rol smra ba po'i ngor rnam par bcad pa dang /
T02D2107:138b-13: yongs su bcad pas bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:138b-14: 'dir ni nyams su myong ba'i yul du gyur pa
T02D2107:138b-15: la de med pas rang la snang ba'i mkha' khyab
T02D2107:138b-16: bo // sprul pa ni rten 'brel las byung bas so //
T02D2107:138b-17: tshogs ni de'i bdag med pa'i lha tshogs rnams so //
T02D2107:138b-19: ma skyes mi 'gag ces bya ba ni /
T02D2107:138b-20: gang skye ba'i zlas drang ba 'gag pa yin la
T02D2107:138b-21: 'di ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la 'gag pa 'byung
T02D2107:138b-23: gang nas gang skye ba med pa la gang du
T02D2107:138b-24: gang gnas pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro
T02D2107:138b-25: // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzugs ni gang nas kyang ma byung gang du yang mi gnas /
T02D2107:138b-26: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do zhes gsungs so //
T02D2107:138b-27: de'i phyir ma skyes pa nyid mi 'gag pas 'byung ba de'i skye ba dang /
T02D2107:138b-29: de bas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni sangs rgyas
T02D2107:138b-30: thams cad kyi gsang gsum bsdus pa'i tshig dgu yin
T02D2107:138b-31: no // de yang sems dang sems las byung ba ni sgyu ma nyid du 'phrul pa dang /
T02D2107:138b-32: sgyu ma nyid du rtogs pa'i dra ba ni bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa'o //
T02D2107:138b-34: da ni bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'o //
T02D2107:138b-35: rdo rje mig gis gnang ba ma gsal bar du blta zhes bya ba la /
T02D2107:138b-36: 'di lta bu'i rdo rje'i mig gi yul yin pas rdo rje'i mig ste /
T02D2107:138b-37: ye shes kyi mig gis blta bar 'dod do //
T02D2107:138b-38: gzung ba'i chos rnams ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyar blta'o //
T02D2107:139a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi bskyod pa yongs su grub pa'i me long gi @139a * //
T02D2107:139a-2: mi bskyod pa sems dang sems las byung ba ni
T02D2107:139a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i mig gis blta ba'i phyir yul
T02D2107:139a-4: yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2107:139a-5: de ltar blta ba'i yul can la yang ming de skad ces grags so //
T02D2107:139a-6: de yang ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D2107:139a-7: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2107:139a-9: stong pa nyid la stong nyid mthong //
T02D2107:139a-12: snang gsal bar du blta zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2107:139a-13: don de dag la dang po rnal 'byor bstan bas /
T02D2107:139a-14: yid ches pa sngon du song bas /
T02D2107:139a-15: zag pa med pa'i bdud rtsir gyur pas bdag 'dris
T02D2107:139a-16: pa'i bar de srid du shes rab kyis blta zhing
T02D2107:139a-17: bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2107:139a-20: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
T02D2107:139a-21: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
T02D2107:139a-23: de nas 'bad pa med pa'i mtshan brjod pa ni /
T02D2107:139a-24: sgyu ma brag ca nam mkha'i rang bzhin du //
T02D2107:139a-26: ji skad bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor na sgyu ma yin
T02D2107:139a-27: pas phyi dang nang dang bral ba'i snang bar mthong
T02D2107:139a-28: ba dang / mtshan gyi sngags bzlas pa rnams ni /
T02D2107:139a-29: byed pa po la sogs pa gsum med pas phyi dang nang du gsal ba'i brag ca'o //
T02D2107:139a-30: 'di gnyis ni gzugs dang sgra'i rnam pa ste /
T02D2107:139a-31: mtshan ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ste /
T02D2107:139a-34: sprul sku'i yul gsung gi longs spyod dang /
T02D2107:139a-35: mi g-yo ba la gnas pa ni sku'i yul lo //
T02D2107:139a-36: de ltar na dbyibs dang sngags kyis ni 'di dag
T02D2107:139a-37: la thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes dngos
T02D2107:139a-39: spro ba bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can la sogs pa kun 'dir ldan pa'o //
T02D2107:139a-40: de bas na yongs su shes nas ni khong du chub par byas nas so //
T02D2107:139a-43: ye shes ye shes mtshon pa'i brda'i mtshan gdags pas bya ba ni blag ces pa'i don to //
T02D2107:139a-44: gang gi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba'i sku
T02D2107:139a-45: dang gsung dang thugs thams cad 'dir bshad ce na
T02D2107:139a-47: gsang sngags lam ni rnal 'byor tshul 'dis byed //
T02D2107:139a-49: gsang ba ni sngar bstan pa'i zab pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2107:139b-0: @139b nyan thos la sogs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:139b-1: 'di nyid myur ba nyid du dman pa las skyob pas na sngags yin te /
T02D2107:139b-2: gang gi phyir 'dir ni 'bras bu yan lag bdun
T02D2107:139b-3: dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa de yang
T02D2107:139b-4: phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'bras bus
T02D2107:139b-5: rlobs nas / chos bdag med pa dang bsres nas tshogs bdud rtsi rdzogs par gyur pas /
T02D2107:139b-6: 'jig rten pa'i zhen pa dang snang ba myur du nyams pa yin no //
T02D2107:139b-7: de yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bas rnal 'byor te /
T02D2107:139b-8: 'gro ba la dgongs pa'i ye shes khyad par can des ldog pa yin pas /
T02D2107:139b-9: tshul 'dis byed pa yin par 'dod do //
T02D2107:139b-11: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02D2107:139b-13: gsang sngags kyi lam de gsungs so //
T02D2107:139b-14: rnal 'byor bsgom pa las byung ba //
T02D2107:139b-16: lam de'i rgyun gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2107:139b-17: byed pa sems can kun don byed //
T02D2107:139b-18: ces bya bas 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no ;
T02D2107:139b-21: mthun pa'i gnas su snga dro la sogs pa'i dus
T02D2107:139b-22: gsum dang dam tshig nyams pa med pa gdong bkru
T02D2107:139b-23: ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2107:139b-25: byang chub dang sems can la dmigs pa'i blos rang nyid kyis rgyun bshags bya'o //
T02D2107:139b-26: 'di nyid la 'khor gsum dmigs pa med par chos thams cad lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D2107:139b-27: de nas rang nyid dam tshig dang dbyibs su langs la /
T02D2107:139b-28: hr'i:dang h'um las kye rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2107:139b-29: aom h'um aa aom a'a:zhes bya bas /
T02D2107:139b-30: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
T02D2107:139b-31: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug che //
T02D2107:139b-32: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag //
T02D2107:139b-33: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
T02D2107:139b-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
T02D2107:139b-35: zhes bya bar byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2107:139b-36: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2107:139b-37: mthe bo mthe'u chung rdo rjer sprel //
T02D2107:139b-38: rdo rje 'khor lo'i ming brjod cing //
T02D2107:139b-41: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
T02D2107:139b-42: zhes gsungs pas sems dang sems las byung ba'i dbyings dang rigs bsdus pa'i nges pa lnga dang /
T02D2107:139b-43: ting nge 'dzin sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2107:139b-44: pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad dang /
T02D2107:139b-45: mthong ba dang bsgom pa ni ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2107:140a-0: de nas rim pa phyi ma @140a * //
T02D2107:140a-2: dri ma dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas ral gri dang 'khor lo can dang /
T02D2107:140a-3: bdud 'dul bar ral gri dang rdo rje can dang /
T02D2107:140a-4: 'dod chags la ral gri dang padma can dang /
T02D2107:140a-5: sbel du yod par ral gri dang /
T02D2107:140a-6: rin po che dang sna tshogs par ral gri dang /
T02D2107:140a-7: sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa dang /
T02D2107:140a-8: bla ma dang slob dpon rnams dang /
T02D2107:140a-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas btab pa pos gdul bya gnas gsum pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D2107:140a-10: de nas brda rnams ni sku rdo rjer blta'o //
T02D2107:140a-11: mtshon cha rnams ni gsung rdo rjer blta'o //
T02D2107:140a-12: bdag nyid ni thugs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D2107:140a-13: de la brda ni ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2107:140a-14: mtshon pa ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D2107:140a-15: bdag ni rang bzhin gyis snying skul bar byed pas
T02D2107:140a-16: na skad cig ma dang por rnal 'byor pa bdag
T02D2107:140a-17: nyid la de dag nges par bsgom mo //
T02D2107:140a-18: chos thams cad rtogs pa'i mchog skyes nas slob ma
T02D2107:140a-19: rnams la bdag gi khong du chud par bya ba'i
T02D2107:140a-20: phyir / dad pa dang mos pa dang /
T02D2107:140a-21: nges par mtshon pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2107:140a-22: de nas bstod pa dang spro bsdu dang don rtogs pa rnams yin te /
T02D2107:140a-23: de nas mthar yang rigs drug gi bdag nyid la
T02D2107:140a-24: rang la bsdus la ji skad bshad pa'i nang gi
T02D2107:140a-25: rnal 'byor ye shes gnas par byed pa rtag tu
T02D2107:140a-26: bsgom par bya'o // de yang chos kyi dbyings dang sems can gyi don gyi phyir ro //
T02D2107:140a-28: lam 'di'i sa'i ngo bo brjod bas dman pa dgag pa ni //
T02D2107:140a-29: mkha' la dngos rnams ji ltar gnas bzhin du //
T02D2107:140a-30: zhes bya ba ni dpe brjod pa ste /
T02D2107:140a-31: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
T02D2107:140a-32: zhes gsungs pas sa la dang de'i khyab pa ni /
T02D2107:140a-33: nam mkhas khyab cing de las ma g-yos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:140a-34: rten cing 'brel pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i
T02D2107:140a-35: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnams ni 'od gsal ba'i
T02D2107:140a-36: ye shes las byung zhing ma g-yos pas bems po
T02D2107:140a-37: dang dngos por thad chad pas ma yin no //
T02D2107:140a-39: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog / lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po //
T02D2107:140a-40: gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du ston //
T02D2107:140a-42: 'di nyid dam tshig dkyil 'khor yang yin la /
T02D2107:140a-43: phyag rgya chen po yang yin pas na /
T02D2107:140a-45: brda dang mtshan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:140b-0: de yang snying po len pa'i dkyil 'khor ni phyag rgya chen por @140b gnas pas /
T02D2107:140b-1: gzhan du mi 'byung gzhan la mi gnas te /
T02D2107:140b-2: phyogs gzhan ni chad pa dang nges pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:140b-3: ji skad dpal mkha' 'gro ma gur las kyang /
T02D2107:140b-4: thabs ni stong par ma bshad do //
T02D2107:140b-5: gal te stong yul thabs yin na /
T02D2107:140b-6: 'bras bu rgyu las mi gzhan phyir //
T02D2107:140b-7: de ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur //
T02D2107:140b-9: bde ba'i thabs su sdom pa'o //
T02D2107:140b-11: nges pa med par yang 'byung ba ma yin te /
T02D2107:140b-12: dpal dam tshig bkod pa las kyang /
T02D2107:140b-13: sems ni dri med par rtogs na //
T02D2107:140b-15: mkha' la rtog pa'i dri mar bcas //
T02D2107:140b-16: de srid bar du de mi snang //
T02D2107:140b-18: de ltar na 'gyur gyi phyogs gzhan yang mi 'gog ste /
T02D2107:140b-19: nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba //
T02D2107:140b-20: zhes gsungs pas dkyil 'khor bdag med pa la thad chad pa ma yin zhe na /
T02D2107:140b-21: don de mi shes dka' ba'i lam g-yeng bas //
T02D2107:140b-22: 'khor ba'i dri gsum dag las g-yo ba min //
T02D2107:140b-24: gang yang rgyu 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni rjes
T02D2107:140b-25: su mthun par 'jug pa las thabs su 'os na
T02D2107:140b-27: de ltar ma yin na ni re zhig dbugs dbyung bar dgongs kyi /
T02D2107:140b-28: bdag med pa la sogs pa las ldog pa ni
T02D2107:140b-29: nges pa'i lung dang rigs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro
T02D2107:140b-30: // gang 'di ltar snang ba ni bag chags kyi
T02D2107:140b-31: tshogs las byung gi / gang gi phyir sangs rgyas
T02D2107:140b-32: dang sems can 'dra ba nyid du thal zhes bya'o
T02D2107:140b-34: 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa las kyang
T02D2107:140b-35: shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs kyi yul ni bcings
T02D2107:140b-36: pa'o ; / thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab kyang bcings pa'o //
T02D2107:140b-37: de yang yod pa dang med pa ni rtag pa dang chad par 'gyur bas /
T02D2107:140b-38: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
T02D2107:140b-39: zhes bya ba yang mi 'grub pas /
T02D2107:140b-40: don de mi shes pa ni sngar bstan pa dag mi shes pa'o //
T02D2107:140b-41: dka' ba'i lam ni g-yeng bas na yun ring ba nyid 'dod pa brtags pa la zhen pa'i phyir /
T02D2107:140b-42: 'phags pa dang mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'o //
T02D2107:140b-43: de nyid kyi phyir yul dman pa dang zhen pa'i
T02D2107:140b-44: tshogs kyis gnas gsum gyi 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis las
T02D2107:141a-1: nyams pa'i thabs dang shes rab phul du phyin pa dang /
T02D2107:141a-2: 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pas lam chen po yin no //
T02D2107:141a-4: snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos //
T02D2107:141a-5: shas rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2107:141a-6: nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel //
T02D2107:141a-8: de'i phyir rtogs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni ;
T02D2107:141a-9: de lta'i don shes rang bzhin nyes pa'i tshogs /
T02D2107:141a-10: bcom pa spos kyi glang po ke ta ka / zos bzhin bcom ldan gzhung tshogs yon tan thob //
T02D2107:141a-11: 'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur //
T02D2107:141a-13: de lta'i don shes pa ni sngar bstan pa dang rtogs pa'o //
T02D2107:141a-14: rang bzhin nyes pa ni ma rig pa'i yul lo //
T02D2107:141a-15: de'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang srid pa'i cha'o //
T02D2107:141a-17: de yang gzhi gcig la rtogs pas rdzas mi 'ching ba'o //
T02D2107:141a-19: rtog pa'i yul gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyen pos bcom pa'o //
T02D2107:141a-20: gnyen po dang mi mthun pa ni nus pa mnyam du zin pas /
T02D2107:141a-21: thog ma dang mthar yul yod pa dang med pas phye bas yul can yang 'thad pa'o //
T02D2107:141a-22: de'i tshogs ni rgyud med pa'i phyir mi skye ba'o //
T02D2107:141a-23: gnyis pa ni de'i thabs med par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:141a-24: 'dir ni 'phags pa dang mi mthun pa'i rnam par
T02D2107:141a-25: rtog pa'i snang ba la grags pa dang sems las
T02D2107:141a-26: byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob 'joms pa'o //
T02D2107:141a-27: gzhung tshogs yon tan thob ces bya ba ni /
T02D2107:141a-28: gdul bya 'jug pas gnas skabs pa'o //
T02D2107:141a-29: de'i mthar thug pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal
T02D2107:141a-30: ba'i nges pa la nam yang 'jug par mi 'gyur
T02D2107:141a-32: 'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2107:141a-33: dpal mchog dang po'i ngo bo nyid ni thog ma
T02D2107:141a-34: dang tha ma med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir
T02D2107:141a-35: ro // sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin ma bcos pa nyid la bshad kyi /
T02D2107:141a-36: gzhan du skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa ni byas pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2107:141a-37: de'i phyir 'di la rgyu'i rim pas byas pa med pas mthar 'gag pa yang med do /
T02D2107:141a-39: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
T02D2107:141a-40: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
T02D2107:141a-42: gang yang dus kyi mtha'i skad cig la chos thams cad khong du chud pa ni rgyu yin la /
T02D2107:141b-0: @141b de'i rgyu ni sangs rgyas yin pas //
T02D2107:141b-1: sangs rgyas thog ma dang ldan la mtha' ni med pa yin te /
T02D2107:141b-2: de lta ma yin na lam la sogs pa'i 'bad
T02D2107:141b-3: pa bya mi dgos par 'gyur ro snyam na ni
T02D2107:141b-4: / de yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2107:141b-5: sangs rgyas ni dbyings dang ye shes bya ba yin gyi /
T02D2107:141b-6: dbyings dang bral ba'i ye shes ni gang gi ye shes kyang ma yin pas /
T02D2107:141b-7: dbyings ni sngar brjod pa yin te /
T02D2107:141b-8: gnas skabs kyi ye shes ni rtogs pa'i nges pa ste /
T02D2107:141b-9: de ni thog ma dang tha ma gnyis par yang
T02D2107:141b-10: gyur pas lam yang dgos par smra ba de'i mthong
T02D2107:141b-11: bar byas pa ni thog ma'o //
T02D2107:141b-12: de'i yul mtha' dang bral bas yul yang mtha' med par rigs pa yin no //
T02D2107:141b-13: de'i phyir 'dir tha snyad gnyis kyis 'jug ste /
T02D2107:141b-14: rgyu'i tha snyad ni ngo bo nyid de rang bzhin
T02D2107:141b-15: stong pa nyid la sogs pa mi 'gyur ba'i rang
T02D2107:141b-16: bzhi no // de'i rkyen ni thos pa la sogs
T02D2107:141b-17: pa'i de dang mthun par rjes su zhugs pa yin
T02D2107:141b-18: bzhi no // no // de dang de'i bdag nyid phrad pa ni /
T02D2107:141b-19: 'bras bur yang tha snyad btags kyang de'i yul las nges pa po gzhan na med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:141b-20: gal te gzhan du gyur pa ni nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin te /
T02D2107:141b-21: kun du brtags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2107:141b-22: de bas na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad ni rkyen gyis rnam par bzhag gi /
T02D2107:141b-23: de la 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i chos gang yang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2107:141b-24: 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D2107:141b-25: lam de las byung ba gzhung gi tshogs du ma
T02D2107:141b-27: phyogs bcur dam pa'i tshogs kyi snang ba'i rgyun mi
T02D2107:141b-28: 'chad pa'i chos kyi rgyal por zhes bya ba dpal
T02D2107:141b-29: mchog dang po'i yul thog ma dang tha ma med
T02D2107:141b-30: pas yul can la dgongs pa'o //
T02D2107:141b-31: ma 'gags pa'i 'bad pa ni bral ba'i rang bzhin
T02D2107:141b-32: gyi dbang gis 'byung ba ni rgyun chad pa yin
T02D2107:141b-33: pas / rang gi dag pa'i ye shes mi 'gag pas 'di'i snang ba dang mdzad pa de 'dra'o //
T02D2107:141b-34: 'di ni mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
T02D2107:141b-35: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
T02D2107:141b-36: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste //
T02D2107:141b-37: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
T02D2107:141b-38: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po //
T02D2107:141b-40: de ltar lam gyi che ba brjod nas /
T02D2107:141b-41: brjod bya dang brjod pa'i khyab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2107:142a-2: / bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i don rtogs ldan par shog
T02D2107:142a-3: / dpal mee tri pas mdzad pa nye bar bsdus
T02D2107:142a-4: shing / zab cing rgya che ba'i 'grel ba /
T02D2107:142a-5: mkhas pa chen po dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
